title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, and manage models with a simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: run and chat with local LLMs from Node or the browser.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat, or embedding backend inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted WebUI for Ollama with chat history, RAG, user management, and plugin ecosystem.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and custom model creation utilities.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: Ollama-GUI-Electron
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Electron, themes, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive terminal chat wrapper with conversation memory, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples: CPU & GPU stacks, Open-WebUI sidecar, and RAG with Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-nim-sdk
summary: Unofficial Nim SDK wrapping the Ollama REST API with async HTTP and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama LLM, Chroma vector DB, and RAG for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context-aware chat and model management methods.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community-tuned Ollama Modelfiles (CodeLlama-13b-Python, Llama3-8b-Instruct-Uncensored, etc.).
